1947313.effect:
If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Super Quant" monsters, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. You can only use each of the following effects of "Super Quantum Yellow Layer" once per turn.
● When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Super Quant" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. 
● If this card is sent to the GY: You can target any number of other "Super Quant" monsters in your GY with different names; attach those targets to a "Super Quantal Mech" Xyz Monster(s) you control as material.
1947313.name: Super Quantum Yellow Layer

1947328.effect: Detach any number of materials from 1 Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon up to the same number of "Super Quantal Mech Beast" Xyz Monsters with different Attributes from your GY, then you can attach up to 1 monster from your GY to each "Super Quantal Mech Beast" Xyz Monster you control as material that is listed on that Xyz Monster. You can banish this card from your GY, then declare a Level from 1 to 12; all "Super Quant" monsters you currently control with a Level has their Level become the declared Level. You can only use 1 "Super Quantal Mech Tactic - Alphanfinisher" effect per turn, and only once that turn, also, you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck the turn you activate either effect, except "Super Quant" monsters.
1947328.name: Super Quantal Mech Tactic - Alphanfinisher

1947309.effect:
Apply the following effects, in sequence, based on the monster(s) you currently control.
● No monsters or only non-"Super Quant" monster(s): Special Summon 1 "Super Quant" monster from your hand or GY.
● Only "Super Quant" monster(s): Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Super Quantal Mech Beast" Xyz Monster with the same Attribute as 1 "Super Quantum" monster you control or have in your GY by using that monster as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.).
● "Super Quantal Mech" monster: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls, and if you do, attach it to 1 "Super Quantal Mech" Xyz Monster you control as material.
● "Super Quantal Mech King"`monster: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls, and if you do, attach it to 1 "Super Quantal Mech" Xyz Monster you control as material.
1947309.name: Super Quantal Union - Aphanformation

1947311.effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 "Super Quant" Xyz Monster you control; attach from your GY to that target as material, 1 "Super Quant" monster with the same Attribute. You can banish this card from your field or GY; place 1 "Super Quantal Mech Ship Magnacarrier" from your Deck face-up in your Field Zone.
1947311.name: Super Quantal Mech Ship Aphancarrier

1947312.effect:
2 Level 6 monsters
Cannot attack unless it has material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 card that is banished or in either GY; if it is a a "Super Quant" card, return it to the hand, otherwise, shuffle it into the Deck. This is a Quick Effect if this card has "Super Quantum Yellow Layer" as material. Once per turn: You can attach 1 "Super Quantum" monster from your hand or field to this card as material.
1947312.name: Super Quantal Mech Beast Triceraid

662694.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 4 EARTH, WATER, FIRE, and/or WIND monsters from your GY with different names; apply the following effects in sequence, based on the Attribute(s) of "Koa'ki Meiru" monsters banished for this effects activation. You can only use the preceding effect of "Koa'ki Meiru Krazy Kozaky" once per turn. ● EARTH: Destroy 1 Set card on the field. ● WATER: Banish 1 monster from the GYs. If it is a LIGHT or DARK monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to the banished monsters ATK/DEF. ● FIRE: Destroy 1 monster on the field. If it is a LIGHT or DARK monster, shuffle it into the Deck instead of sending it to the GY. ● WIND: Return 1 card from your GY to your hand.
662694.name: Koa'ki Meiru Krazy Kozaky

662716.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 3 EARTH, WATER, FIRE, and/or WIND monsters from your GY with different names; apply the following effects in sequence, based on the Attribute(s) of "Koa'ki Meiru" monsters banished for this effects activation. You can only use the preceding effect of "Koa'ki Meiru Mad Scientist" once per turn. ● EARTH: Change 1 face-up monster on the field to face-down Defense Position. ● WATER: Gain LP equal to the ATK of the monster with the highest ATK in the GYs. ● FIRE: Inflict Damage to your opponent equal to the DEF of the monster in the field with the highest DEF. ● WIND: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.

662741.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. You can only use the preceding effect of "Koa'ki Meiru Rogue Core" once per turn. ● EARTH: All LIGHT and DARK monsters cannot activate their effects in the GY. ● WATER: All DARK monsters on the field lose 1000 ATK/DEF. ● FIRE: This card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each LIGHT and DARK monster on your opponents field and GY. ● WIND: All LIGHT monsters on the field lose 1000 ATK/DEF.

You can only use this effect of "Koa'ki Meiru Specimen #K001" once per turn.

662784.effect:
(Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; apply 1 of these effects.

● Reveal 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in your hand, then, Special Summon 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" monster from your hand.

You can only use 1 "Koa'ki Meiru Specimen #MS00" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

● Reveal your hand to your opponent; shuffle any number of "Koa'ki Meiru" cards and/or cards that specifically list the card "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand and/or face-up field into the Deck, and if you do, draw cards equal to the amount shuffled into the Deck.

662734.effect:

● Reveal 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in your hand, then Set up to 2 "Koa'ki Meiru" Spell/Traps and/or Spell/Traps that specifically lists "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in its text directly from your Deck with different names, except for "Core of Koa'ki Meiru" cards.
During the End Phase, if a "Koa'ki Meiru" monster(s) is destroyed while this card is in your GY: You can reveal your hand to your opponent; if you have no "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in it, Set this card to your field but banish it when it leaves the field. During the End Phase, if a "Koa'ki Meiru" monster(s) is destroyed: You can reveal your hand to your opponent, then if you have no "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in it, target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You cannot activate this effect of "Core Retreat Mechanism" again this turn when other monsters with that same original Attribute are destroyed, and you can only activate this effect of "Core Retreat Mechanism" once per Chain.

2 "Dinomist" Pendulum Monsters with different Levels or Pendulum Scales

2+ Level 5 monsters

2 LIGHT monsters, including a "Constellar" monster

2 Level 4 LIGHT monsters, including a "Constellar" monster

You can banish 1 card from your hand; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "D/D" monster from GY or face-up Extra Deck to a zone this card points to, but its effects are negated, also both it and this card cannot be used as material for the Summon of a monster, except a "D/D/D" monster. You can only use this effect of "The Weather Painter Sunset" once per turn. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase of the turn after this card was banished from the field to activate a "The Weather" card's effect: You can Special Summon this banished card.

1220047.effect: Cards that would be returned from the field to your opponent's hand by "The Weather" cards or effects are shuffled into the Deck instead. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "The Weather Painter Double Rainbow" per turn, and only once that turn.● During the Standby Phase of the turn after this card was banished from the field to activate a "The Weather" card's effect: You can Special Summon this banished card.● (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "The Weather" card from your GY or face-up field; draw 1 card.

1573070.effect: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 monster "Fur Hire" from your hand, except "Nao, Shieldsman Fur Hire". If a monster "Fur Hire" is Special Summoned to your field while you control this card (except during the Damage Step): You can change this card's battle position, and if you do, send 1 card "Fur Hire" from your Deck to the GY, then if it was a Level 5 or higher monster, you can replace this effect with that monster's original effects. You can only use each effect of "Nao, Shieldsman Fur Hire" once per turn.

1220109.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 monster "Fur Hire" from your Deck to your hand. Negate your opponent's first card or effect that targets a card "Fur Hire" (anywhere) each turn. You can only activate 1 "Encampment Fur Hire per turn.

You can only use this effect of "Legendary Shield Fur Hire" once per turn.

During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 monster "Fur Hire" from your Deck, except a monster with the same Type and/or Attribute as a face-up monster. You can only activate 1 "One Fur All and All Fur Hire!" per turn.

During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Watt" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set, but it cannot activate its effects. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

You can only use this effect of 'Wattasmanian" once per turn.

Your opponent cannot target "Watt" monsters this card points to with card effects, also they can attack directly. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 level 6 or lower "Watt" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.) When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Banish up to 2 cards from your opponent's GY.

534360.effect: These hidden troops of the Draconia Empire wield spears tipped with poison. They ambush any intruders from foreign lands, and serve to make Draconia a dangerous place for any who would bring it harm.
534360.name: Cave Dragoons of Draconia
534360.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if you Normal or Special Summon a Normal Monster(s): Add 1 "Draconia" card from your Deck to your hand.

534361.effect: The most evil of the Dragoons of Draconia, these troops will not hesitate to use underhanded tactics. Though even the other Dragoons fear them, they are just trying their best to defend their homeland in their own way.
534361.name: Dark Dragoons of Draconia
534361.pendulum_effect: If a Normal Monster you control declares an attack: Negate the effects of all cards your opponent controls until the end of the Damage Step, also your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step.

534374.effect: These armed troops, on their gigantic beasts, are the strongest of the Dragoons of Draconia. Opposing armies fear these crack troops, and to see one is to know defeat.
534374.name: Grand Dragoons of Draconia
534374.pendulum_effect: If a Normal Monster you control battles, during damage calculation: You can have that monster's ATK/DEF become equal to the ATK or DEF (whichever is higher) of the opponent's battling monster +100, during damage calculation only. You can only use this effect of "Grand Dragoons of Draconia" once per turn.

534394.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except Normal Monsters, during the turn you use this card's effects, or while this card is on the field. If a "Draconia" monster(s) would be sent from the field to the Extra Deck, you can add those monsters to your hand instead. Once per turn: You can destroy 1 card on your side of the field, then add 1 "Draconia" monster from your Deck to your hand.
534394.name: The Draconia Empire

2031615.effect: If you control 2 "Draconia" cards in your Pendulum Zones, negate the first card or effect your opponent activates each turn that would add a card(s) from their Deck to their hand or Special Summon a monster(s) from their Deck. You can target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; destroy it, and if you do, you can place 1 "Draconia" Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Draconian Spirit" once per turn.

1288029.effect: All "Draconia" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy 1 "Draconia" monster you control, and if you do, negate that target's effects, and if you do that, destroy it. You can only use this effect of "The Forces of Draconia" once per turn.
1288029.name: The Forces of Draconia

7241.effect: Silently creeping in from the deep sea, elite black ops marine troops of the Draconia Empire wage an endless battle against the hated Principality of Dinon on the sea's opposite shores.

7241.pendulum_effect: When a monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Sea Dragoons of Draconia" once per turn.

7096.effect: Armed with muskets and iron spears, these mounted land troops of the Draconia Empire are feared by the Reptier Kingdom and other bordering nations.
7096.name: Dragoons of Draconia
7096.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if a Normal Monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle, after damage calculation: You can add 1 Level 4 or higher Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.

7430.effect: Rumored as being formed to invade the neutral, floating Sky-State of Cxulub, these mounted air troops of the Draconia Empire have prompted bordering nations to strengthen their security.

7430.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, when a Normal Monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

1016009.effect: You can discard this card; send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if you do, you can add 1 "Lightray" card that is banished or in your GY to your hand, except "Lightray Parshath". All face-up monsters you control must be Warrior-Type to activate and to resolve this effect.

5646.effect: If 3 or more of your LIGHT monsters are banished, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle.

1565427.effect: (This card's name is always treated as "Phantasm Spiral Dragon".)A sea-dweller that continues to resist the Atlantean Army. 1576620.effect: A pile of bones found on the Titanus' island they call home. It was dug out of the ground, but despite its normally inanimate nature (being a skeleton and all), it can move around as if it were alive.

You can only use 1 "Mysterious Odokuro of Titanus Island" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1576628.effect: You can discard 2 other "Titanus" cards; Special Summon this card from your hand, then, if you discarded 2 Level 8 "Titanus" monsters to activate this effect, you can destroy all of your opponent's cards in this card's column. 1576635.effect: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (DARK/Dragon/Level 8/ATK 2500/DEF 3000). (This card is also still a Trap.) While this card is a monster: You can target 1 "Titanus" monster you control; if this effect was activated during your opponent's turn, destroy that target, and if you do, 1 "Titanus" monster you control gains ATK equal to that destroyed monster's original ATK. Otherwise, it can attack directly this turn. You can only use this effect of "Ghidorah, False Kaiser of the Titanus" once per turn. If this face-up card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Titanus" monster from your Deck to your hand.

1576635.treated_as: Ghidorah, False Kaiser of the Titanus

1576639.effect:
2 Level 8 monsters

(Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 2 face-up cards (1 on each field); if either target is a "Titanus" monster, it gains the following effect until the end of this turn. Otherwise, negate its effects until the End Phase. You can only use each of the preceding effects of "Organizer T-1, Imitation of the Titanus" once per turn.
●Once per turn, if all monsters you control are Level/Rank 8 monsters (min. 1): You can draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.

You can only use each effect of "EX-Saber Godfrey" once per turn.

1543969.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "X-Saber" monsters

1543987.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner EARTH monsters

During the End Phase: You can target 1 "X-Saber" monster that was sent to the GY this turn while this card was face-up; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "EX-Saber Jean" once per turn.

1580993.effect: FLIP: You can Set 1 "World Legacy" Spell/Trap Card directly from your Deck, then, if it is your opponent's Battle Phase, end the Battle Phase.If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field in face-down Defense Position while this card is in your GY: Special Summon this card in face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Uptake Krawler Terminal" once per turn.

1577737.effect: 1 "Dream Mirror" monster + "Ikelos, the Dream Mirror Sprite" or "Ikelos, the Dream Mirror Mara"While face-up on the field, this card is also LIGHT-Attribute. You can only use each effect of "Oneiros, the Dream Mirror Demoness" once per turn.? If this card is Summoned, or if another monster you control is Tributed (except during the Damage Step): You can Set 1 "Dream Mirror" Spell/Trap from your Deck.? (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Dream Mirror" monster from your GY, except "Oneiros, the Dream Mirror Demoness".

1769587.effect: When the time was right, she'd strike. No matter the minute, nor the hour, she would wreak havoc and cause change in the world that is filled with despair.

1769603.effect: Only he could know of what was possible. If word got out, then everything would go awry. He had to keep everything going, unless he wished hatred from his god.
1769603.name: Evisio the Drorar Savant

1769640.effect: Mari and Veria have always been great friends. When Veria isn't making fun of just how dense Mari always is, she longs for some quality alone time with her.
1769640.name: Veria, Mechashot Marvel

1769659.effect: Why is he here? Why must he live among people who he cares not for? What was the point of it all? He had so many questions. So, so many questions...
1769659.name: Atrias, Unfeeling Aeroleo
1769659.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 Machine Normal Monster from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck, and if you do, add 1 Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand that specifically lists that Special Summoned monster's name in its text, and if you do that, destroy this face-up card. You can only use this effect of "Atrias, Unfeeling Aeroleo" once per turn.

1769674.effect:
The intercom rang, "Sir, we have sights on a new threat."
The responder calls out, "A new threat? What's being locked?"
"We cant be certain, but we assume it to be some kind of ETB."
"Are you sure about that? What is it doing?"
"If I had to guess, I think its going to kill us." The com cut out.

1769674.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, then draw 1 card. All monsters you control must be Machine Normal Monsters to activate and resolve this effect (min. 1). You can only use this effect of "BKR-MKIII Arc-W" once per turn.

1769694.effect: Benevolence was arriving. A new world - a new reality - was upon them all, and they all knew it.

1863312.effect: Born into a religious family, Lin Tian-Liao left his hometown and moved to Taipei to study and follow his dreams, trying to escape the pressures of returning to his family's temple in the process. His ordinary college life seemed to be going well until suddenly one day his third eye was opened. Liao, now able to see the various spirits and gods in the world, has to deal with his new found powers, his school life, and three particular cats who all want to have a say in his life and his future.

1945268.effect:
Ah, the good ol' days. When cards had stats like mine and the most exciting part of a Duel was seeing whether somebody's best beatstick was "La Jin the Mystical Genie of the Lamp" or "Mechanical Chaser". Back when "Reinforcenents" was a staple and the zones all made sense. Back when the Extra Deck was the Fusion Deck and "Polymerizat1on" was nigh impossible to resolve, but oh, did it feel good to resolve! Now you have all your ROTAs, and your draws, and your negates... I bet none of you whippersnappers even noticed that I misspelled all the card names I mentioned!

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)

- Monster: Its effects are negated, also place 1 Thunder Counter on it. Monsters on the field with Thunder Counters lose 500 ATK/DEF and cannot change their battle positions.
- Spell/Trap Card: Destroy it.

1978667.effect: Defender Spirite of the Forgotten Cave, Hero of the Cave Lives, Pretty Rock Boy. All of these accurately describe it, yet when the right conditions are met, something happens.

1983661.effect: Draconia's Dragoons could only wage war for so long before the ocean waves took them asunder... but thanks to the power of the ancient city, one lived on in spirit, now serving a new ruler of the depths.

2041339.effect:
"And then I'm gonna put a volcano on its back!"
"Why a volcano, honey?"
"Dinosaurs are cool! And volcanoes are also cool! So if I put em together, it'll be SUPER cool!"

Some card designers start much further ahead than others, and some have the best siblings.

1976335.effect: And so West played the song eternal, and the birds she calls "Mekavians" took flight. Her final words were a parting gift, and in the blink of an eye, she traded in her own life to see magic return to the world.

You can only use this effect of "Pantheism of the Monarchs" once per turn.

8537.effect: If this card is sent from the Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. 8177.effect: "A-Assault Core" + "B-Buster Drake" + "C-Crush Wyvern"Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control and/or from your GY. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; banish it. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card, then target 3 of your banished LIGHT Machine Union monsters with different names; Special Summon them.

5311.effect:
3 "Gem-Knight" monsters
Must first be Fusion Summoned. This card gains 100 ATK for each "Gem-" monster in your Graveyard. Once per turn: You can banish 1 Level 7 or lower "Gem-Knight" Fusion Monster from your Graveyard; until the End Phase, this card's name becomes that monster's, and replace this effect with that monster's original effects.

6958.effect:
1 "Ritual Beast Tamer" monster + 1 "Spiritual Beast" monster
Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn: You can target 2 of your banished "Ritual Beast" cards; return them to the Graveyard, and if you do, add 1 "Ritual Beast" card from your Deck to your hand. During either player's turn: You can return this card you control to the Extra Deck, then target 2 of your banished monsters (1 "Ritual Beast Tamer" monster and 1 "Spiritual Beast" monster); Special Summon them in Defense Position.
6958.name: Ritual Beast Ulti-Cannahawk

7303.effect:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Pendulum Monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 Pendulum Monster on the field or 1 card in the Pendulum Zone; destroy it, and if you do, shuffle 1 card on the field into the Deck. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Dracoslayer" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, but it cannot be used as a Synchro Material for a Summon.

7510.effect:
2 Level 8 "D/D" monsters
After this card is Xyz Summoned, for the rest of this turn, other cards and their effects cannot be activated on the field, and other cards' effects on the field are negated. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 "Dark Contract" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard; Set that target.
7510.name: D/D/D Duo-Dawn King Kali Yuga

8231.effect: 2 Level 2 Aqua monstersOnce per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Frog" monster from your Deck. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Aqua monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, then you can Set it to your field. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 WATER monster in your GY; add it to your hand.
8231.name: Toadally Awesome

9508.effect:
2 Effect Monsters, including an "Orcust" monster
This linked card cannot be destroyed by battle. You can target 1 of your banished Machine monsters; shuffle it into the Deck, then you can Set 1 "Orcust" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Galatea, the Orcust Automaton" once per turn.
9508.name: Galatea, the Orcust Automaton

9693.effect:
2 FIRE Effect Monsters
If a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to the zone(s) this card points to (except during the Damage Step): You can add 1 FIRE monster from your GY to your hand, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Normal Summon/Set or Special Summon monsters with the added monster's name. During your Main Phase, if you control this card that was Link Summoned using "Salamangreat Sunlight Wolf" as material: You can add 1 "Salamangreat" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Salamangreat Sunlight Wolf" once per turn.
9693.name: Salamangreat Sunlight Wolf

9762.effect:
2 monsters, including a "Scrap" monster
You can target 1 "Scrap" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then destroy 1 card you control. If another face-up "Scrap" monster is destroyed by card effect, while you control this monster (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon 1 "Scrap" monster from your Deck, then destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use each effect of "Scrap Wyvern" once per turn.
9762.name: Scrap Wyvern
